registry_info.purpose: Track business datasets for DataPilot evaluation testing

retail_sales.name: E-commerce Sales Dataset
retail_sales.description: Online retail transactions with customer data
retail_sales.expected_patterns: Seasonal trends, customer segmentation, product performance

financial_data.name: Stock Market Dataset
financial_data.description: Historical stock prices and trading volumes
financial_data.expected_patterns: Volatility patterns, correlation analysis, trend identification

marketing_campaign.name: Marketing Campaign Data
marketing_campaign.description: Customer demographics and campaign response data
marketing_campaign.expected_patterns: Customer segmentation, campaign effectiveness, demographic insights

hr_analytics.name: HR Employee Attrition
hr_analytics.description: Employee data with attrition and performance metrics
hr_analytics.expected_patterns: Attrition factors, salary analysis, department insights

customer_churn.name: Telecom Customer Churn
customer_churn.description: Customer churn analysis for telecom company
customer_churn.expected_patterns: Churn predictors, service usage patterns, customer lifetime value

supply_chain.name: Supply Chain Dataset
supply_chain.description: Supply chain operations and logistics data
supply_chain.expected_patterns: Delivery performance, cost optimization, regional analysis

healthcare_data.name: Healthcare Cost Analysis
healthcare_data.description: Medical insurance costs and patient demographics
healthcare_data.expected_patterns: Cost factors, age/health correlations, regional variations
